scenes.concept_description: Vast starfield with nebulae, slowly zooming out to reveal more galaxies. Text appears with 'snap_zoom' effect.
scenes.key_takeaway: Did you know there are more stars in the universe than grains of sand on all Earth's beaches? An unfathomable frontier!

scenes.concept_description: Montage grid showing historical space images: a rocket launch, an astronaut on the moon, a Mars rover. Smooth camera pan_left.
scenes.key_takeaway: From the first rockets to setting foot on the Moon, humanity has always gazed upwards, driven by curiosity and courage.

scenes.concept_description: Stylized animation of Earth with a protective shield/aurora, then transitioning to a futuristic space habitat. Text in 'box_highlight' style.
scenes.key_takeaway: Space exploration isn't just about distant planets; it's about pushing boundaries, innovating, and inspiring a new generation right here.

scenes.concept_description: Polaroid scatter of diverse people looking at a starry sky, then a stylized spaceship flying towards a new planet. 'Sparks' particles.
scenes.key_takeaway: The universe awaits! Let's continue to explore, discover, and build a brighter future among the stars.

composition.image_prompt: Vast cosmic nebula with swirling neon gas and distant galaxies, ultra high definition, futuristic, deep space, vibrant purple and blue hues
Futuristic glowing cosmic dust trails, neon particle stream, deep space environment, streaks of light, purple and cyan colors
Close-up of a holographic celestial object, ethereal glow, neon outline, deep space, intricate geometric patterns, floating crystal

scenesWithVisuals.concept_description: Montage grid showing historical space images: a rocket launch, an astronaut on the moon, a Mars rover. Smooth camera pan_left.
scenesWithVisuals.key_takeaway: From the first rockets to setting foot on the Moon, humanity has always gazed upwards, driven by curiosity and courage.
